parameters.name: ApplicationId
parameters.description: Transport layer application ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListTransportLayerApplications](~~ListTransportLayerApplications~~) interface.

parameters.name: CrossBorderOptimization
parameters.description:
Whether to enable China mainland network access optimization, default is disabled. Value range:

- on: Enabled.
- off: Disabled.

parameters.name: IpAccessRule
parameters.description:
IP access rule switch. When enabled, the IP access rules in WAF will take effect on the transport layer application.

- on: Enabled.
- off: Disabled.

parameters.name: Rules
parameters.description: Forwarding rule list. Details of each rule. Except for the comment, all other parameters are required.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: Site ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~ListSites~~) interface.
